entry.title: Sanctuary For The Thrall
entry.summary:
Author: TheNewPenguin

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,126Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 258

Summary: He hadn’t slept since his escape. He couldn’t sleep on the bus, his mind far too busy trying to make sense of the nonsensical. He was exhausted and whatever this thing was on him… it was as if he could feel it drain his energy a little bit every day. He shook his head to try clear his mind and became aware of the fact that the people around him were moving. He hadn’t even felt the bust stop.Tags will be updated as story progresses.
